front.title: MEGACO package for Push To Talk over Cellular (PoC) Networks

abstract.t: Push To Talk over cellular (PoC) networks is supported through centralised Push To Talk Servers which handles both SIP signalling and the media (RTP) relay part. This document defines a distributed architecture for PoC Server implementation with PoC signalling server handling the SIP signalling and group management, whereas Media Server handles the RTP relay part and the communication between these two servers is over MEGACO protocol using the package defined in this document.
